name: Malware Mercenary
description:
THE YEAR IS 2046:

In a world, where Privacy Policies are longer than ever, and Captchas are even more vague, is the story of one young hacker, on the quest for a Sex Robot.

Will you be able to fulfill your contracts? Will you be able to afford your favourite bot? Only time will tell if you will become the number one Malware Mercenary.

FEATURES:

Hackervision: View your victim's house from a direct camera feed, and watch the plan go down.

8 Missions: Different contracts in order to earn money to buy your SexBot.

5 Different Outcomes: Can you earn enough for Alluring Athena, or will you be stuck with Horny Garry?

A unique way to hack: Observational puzzles, questions, and viruses.

Made in under a week for #SBIGJam 2018.
